title: Razorpay || Senior Software Engineer
content:
Years of Experience: 3.3 yrs
Current Experience: SDE 2(fintech unicorn)
Current salary: 29.5 LPA (fix) + 2.9 LPA (based on performance) + 2.3 LPA esops / year
Date: Oct
Company: Razorpay
Title/Level: Senior Software Engineer (SDE-2)
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 38.8 LPA (fix) + 21k / year (pf) + 1 Lac (gratuity and insurance) + 30 LPA ESOP (vested over 4 years) 
Variable pay: 0
Total comp (Salary + Bonus): 39 LPA per year + 7.5 LPA esops 

**Reason for change:** Toxicity in team and not good work only maintenance work

**Accepted** (As no other offer in hand right now, trying to get few others if not then will join as seems decent company, culture, work and pay)


Would love to know your views on the offer.

Will share interview experince after few days

Thanks

title: Coinbase | IC5 | India
content:
Education: B.Tech. in Computer Science
Years of Experience: 8+
Prior Experience: Google
Date of the Offer: 2024
Company: Coinbase
Title/Level: IC5
Location: India
Salary: INR 66,00,000 LPA
Signing Bonus: 7.5 LPA
Stock bonus: $46K stock grant vested every year
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up 
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~1.3cr 
Benefits: Many benefits
Other details : Left google due to Terrible WLB and only bootlicking seems to help  career. PIP system has started and many silent pip/layoff happening. Only politics helps.
They will give free food to cover all this .

title: LinkedIn | SSE | Bangalore
content:
Education: B.Tech - CS Tier 3
Years of Experience: 4.5 yrs
Current comp: 30 fixed + 5 = 35 lpa
Current company: InMobi

Date of the Offer: 2024 sept
Company: LinkedIn
Title/Level : SSE
Location: Bangalore
Base Salary: 54 lpa
Bonus: 5.4 lpa
Stock: 70k USD over 4 years (25 % each year) approx 15 lacs / yr
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ₹ 75 lpa

Expecting an offer from Google L4, how much can they give fixed and total?
Which will be better?
